summary: During WW2, American General Worden orders Major Wright to pick 12 condemned soldiers from the brig and parachute into occupied France where they must destroy a Nazi nerve gas facility and extricate the foreign scientists working there.
cast: Telly Savalas|Ernest Borgnine|Vince Edwards|Bo Svenson|Vincent Van Patten|James Van Patten|Randall 'Tex' Cobb|Gary Graham|Wolf Kahler|Thom Mathews|Emmanuelle Meyssignac|Paul Picerni|Pavle Balenovic|Mario Barbaric|Branko Blace|Milan Ristic|Matko Raguz|David Horovitch|Bernard Woringer|Meg Wynn Owen|Jay Bura|Bozidar Smiljanic|Frederick Bartman|Werner Stocker|David Pullan|Ned Vukovic|Sam Douglas|Vili Matula|Ivo Kristof|Bozena Ruk-Focic|Gus Savalas|Elizabeth Edmonds|Sallie Anne Field|Slavica Knezevic|Antonia Cutic|David Guber|Tony Lima
keywords: year 1944|1940s|third part|reference to franklin d. roosevelt|nazi collaborator
title: Doce del patíbulo 3: La misión mortal
